financial-engineering-in-software-projec.title: Financial Engineering of Software Projects
financial-engineering-in-software-projec.description: Through the history of computers, we have seen explosive growth in the software industry, and people have made tremendous but still ever-growing investment in technologies and methodologies in software development.
